DOC.brief_title: Functional Outcome Anterior Cruciate Ligament Reconstruction
DOC.detailed_description: The choice graft anterior cruciate ligament reconstruction ( ACLR ) remain controversial . Despite need outcome study compare bone-patellar tendon-bone ( BPTB ) semitendinosus gracilis tendon ( STG ) , study evaluate functional outcome . The objective current study compare hop performance jump land strategy soccer player higher level sport activity ACLR use either BPTB STG control .
